body_html: I speculated that maybe c-ares was being included even though it isn't supposed to be, but that's not it either. I confirmed this by putting a #error directive in ares specific code and confirming that I trigger it on a native gRPC build but not on a TF-specific gRPC build (since this PR defines GRPC_ARES=0 in tools/bazel.rc).
body_text: I speculated that maybe c-ares was being included even though it isn't supposed to be, but that's not it either. I confirmed this by putting a #error directive in ares specific code and confirming that I trigger it on a native gRPC build but not on a TF-specific gRPC build (since this PR defines GRPC_ARES=0 in tools/bazel.rc).
body: I speculated that maybe c-ares was being included even though it isn't supposed to be, but that's not it either. I confirmed this by putting a `#error` directive in ares specific code and confirming that I trigger it on a native gRPC build but not on a TF-specific gRPC build (since this PR defines `GRPC_ARES=0` in `tools/bazel.rc`).
